title: ‘The Studio’ Season 2 Starts Filming Next Week, Seth Rogen Confirms
summary: Fresh off its Golden Globe win for best comedy or musical TV series, “The Studio” is heading back behind the cameras next week. title: Hudson Williams’ Serpent Necklace Was a Nod to His Own Snake Tattoo
summary: For Hudson Williams, the Golden Globes is a finale of sorts to a hall-of-fame press tour since shooting to global stardom as Shane Hollander in “Heated Rivalry.” The newly appointed heartthrob of Hollywood met the moment on Sunday night, wearing a Georgio Armani white suit jacket styled with an ope…

summary: The Golden Globes are over, but we still have a few burning questions: What stars took most advantage of the open bar? How many “Heated Rivalry” jokes were cut? title: Wagner Moura Makes Golden Globes History as First Brazilian Actor to Win Best Actor in a Drama Film
summary: “The Secret Agent” star Wagner Moura won the Golden Globe for best actor in a drama at Sunday night’s star-studded awards ceremony, making history as the first Brazilian actor to ever win in this category. “‘The Secret Agent’ is a film about memory — or the lack of memory — and generational trauma.…

title: Jessie Buckley Wins Golden Globe for ‘Hamnet’ and Thanks the Film’s Grip for Making Soup on Set: ‘This Is Not a Normal Feeling or Situation to Be In’
summary: “Hamnet” star Jessie Buckley won the Golden Globe for best actress in a drama at Sunday night’s star-studded awards ceremony. The win continues a streak for Buckley, who won the Critics Choice award for her performance last weekend, and has also been nominated for the Screen Actors Guild’s Actor Aw…
